Donald Rumsfeld put it this way:`` What you know today can help you unthink your thinking about tomorrow. It can't help you with things you were thinking about back then,'' he said. Back then, there was reasonable confidence that[ Saddam Hussein ] had these weapons. Nor does Donald Rumsfeld register second thoughts about the Pentagon's crucial failure to capture Osama bin Laden in the battle of Tora Bora in December 2001.
